justification: “To assess we also collected the State-Trait Anxiety Inventory for Adults… The raw trait anxiety score has a mean of 42.32.”
“To assess we also collected … the Behavioral Anger Response Questionnaire… the raw direct anger-approach score has a mean of 8.91.”
Participants were asked “How fearful do you feel?” and moved a cursor on “a continuous scale bar ranging from 1 (not … at all) to 10 (very …)” to indicate fear.
Participants were asked “How angry do you feel?” using “a continuous scale bar ranging from 1 (not angry/fearful at all) to 10 (very angry/fearful)” to indicate anger.
